SENT.plain: Uveitis is one of the major features of behcet's disease with relapse and remission pattern
Severe presentation can be resistant to the conventional treatment
Steroid has been used in the treatment of acute behcet's uveitis, although it especially has its own ocular complications when used in large doses
We describe to patients presented with acute uveitis while on treatment, uveitis was controlled by adding anti-tumor necrosis factor (TNF) and Infliximab
